title: Yasuo Ult Safety Mechanic triggers when tower is dead
body:
What kind of black magic fuckery is this?
https://youtu.be/Thf3cothNZI

replies.body:
Did you see how much damage that 1 auto did to Orianna? That is not okay.

As Ornn said, looks like Jayce knockback, that said, the ult should have stopped also, why did it carry on?

> [{quoted}](name=Jaspers,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KuqmQLeW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-14T08:27:47.820+0000)
>
> Did you see how much damage that 1 auto did to Orianna? That is not okay.
> 
> As Ornn said, looks like Jayce knockback, that said, the ult should have stopped also, why did it carry on?

It carried on because it's just an animation, not a channel.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KuqmQLeW,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-05-14T09:14:47.913+0000)
>
> It carried on because it's just an animation, not a channel.

Normally Ori's ult can interrupt Yasuo's, but sometimes it fails when it's just landed. You guess is as good as mine as to why.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaspers,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KuqmQLeW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-14T08:27:47.820+0000)
>
> Did you see how much damage that 1 auto did to Orianna? That is not okay.
> 
> As Ornn said, looks like Jayce knockback, that said, the ult should have stopped also, why did it carry on?

You know, you could be right about that. It wouldn't be the first time i've seen a Yasuo ult immediately after a knockup (on him) lands.
It might be intentional. I can't find anything in the patch notes suggesting it is, but there are champions who are allowed to ult while CC'd.

As for the damage, yeah IE is nuts. It also helps that that's my Support Orianna, so even squishier than a normal one.
I was just salty that I wasn't able to yoink him out of his ult because he didn't appear where I expected. It looked like the turret dive crutch but now that you mention it he's inside the turret range so that doesn't make sense.
KFC's explanation is decent enough. Indeed but then Yasuo does have the tendency to do that to people. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Jaspers,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KuqmQLeW,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2019-05-14T09:38:04.368+0000)
>
> KFC's explanation is decent enough. Indeed but then Yasuo does have the tendency to do that to people. :P

True yasuo can just run around in his ult like he has the odessy augment equipped

> [{quoted}](name=Jaspers,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=KuqmQLeW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-14T08:27:47.820+0000)
>
> Did you see how much damage that 1 auto did to Orianna? That is not okay.
> 
> As Ornn said, looks like Jayce knockback, that said, the ult should have stopped also, why did it carry on?

the ult cant be stopped once it begins, similar to Warwick R only diffrence is that yasuo us not unstopable in his ult and can be pull knocked back/up etc
